definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: It has been 60 years since the country was divided by the civil war.
sentences.chinese: 自從國內戰爭這個國家一分爲二以來，已經60年了。

sentences.english: Open civil war has broken out in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 公開的國內戰爭已經在敘利亞爆發。

sentences.english: The study leads Matt Kroenig to think that countries with strong legislatures will have higher levels of economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 教授說強有力的議會可以有效阻止發生國內戰爭。

sentences.english: OK was in use twenty years before the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: OK一詞於國內戰爭20年前就開始使用了。
